entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 17.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 17. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 25 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Saturday 8 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 4.
